name: Flip Pigs
description:
Explosively fun, colorful pigs, this game tests your ability to ‘find’ and ‘match’ pigs in 2,3,4,5 in a row. Flip pigs in a fundamentally re-imagined match 3 game.
•••••"I love this game, it’s my new Bejeweled!"

•••••"Game of the year. I’m addicted."

Enjoy this fully loaded game with:
• 8 Game Worlds
• Over 72 Levels

•••••TONS of FEATURES•••••
• Locked Pigs
• Mad Pigs
• Tiny & Morph
• Hidden & Concealed

•••••TONS of BONUSES•••••
You will need the following to help you get through the game:
• Bombs to clear them
• Extra time
• Reveal magic wands

•••••SUPERB VALUE•••••
• Awesome music and sounds
• Excellent graphics, and beautiful visuals
• Super Addictive, Easy to learn, Difficult to master
